  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static PersonManager getInstance()
      The constructor is called only if the static instance is null, so only the first time that the getInstance() method is invoked. All the other times the same instance object is returned.
      Returns:
      the instance object is returned.

    • hasSomeUserSameUserName

      public boolean hasSomeUserSameUserName(String userName)
      Used to check if there is already someone with same username.
      Parameters:
      username - is the username we want to check.
      Returns:
      If the username already exists it returns true otherwise false.

    • logIn

      public boolean logIn(Credentials credentials)
      Used to log in with credentials.
      Parameters:
      credentials - is user trying to connect.
      Returns:
      This method returns true if access is successful, otherwise false.

    • getTypeOfUser

      public String getTypeOfUser()
      Used to get the type of user logged on.
      Returns:
      This method returns the type of connected user in string. If none linked, it returns null.
